plot: A young 38 year old man is diagnosed with a rare case of cancer called TBD - Time Bomb Tumor. Within 7 days, his brain is going to explode.
plot_en: A young 38 year old man is diagnosed with a rare case of cancer called TBD - Time Bomb Tumor. Within 7 days, his brain is going to explode.
plot_es: A young 38 year old man is diagnosed with a rare case of cancer called TBD - Time Bomb Tumor. Within 7 days, his brain is going to explode.
title: My Last 7 Days
